lead_paragraph: Striker Islam Slimani scored the only goal as champions Leicester City beat West Ham United 1-0 on Saturday to climb six points clear of the Premier League relegation zone.

headline.print_headline: Leicester Ease Relegation Fears With 1-0 Win Over Hammers
headline.main: Leicester Ease Relegation Fears With 1-0 Win Over Hammers

snippet: Striker Islam Slimani scored the only goal as champions Leicester City beat West Ham United 1-0 on Saturday to climb six points clear of the Premier League relegation zone....
